thread.title: Lewis Hamilton 'dating' Sofia Richie – a whopping 14-year age gap
thread.title_full: Lewis Hamilton 'dating' Sofia Richie – a whopping 14-year age gap

title: Lewis Hamilton 'dating' Sofia Richie – a whopping 14-year age gap
text:
NEW ROMANCE: Lewis is reportedly dating Sofia 
The British hunk is rumoured to be dating model Sofia Richie. 
The 32-year-old was spotted romancing his 18-year-old beau at Sugarfish and the Montage Hotel in Beverley Hills. 
The two attempted to keep their heads down as they headed to the luxury venue for sushi. Are these the greatest F1 drivers of all time? Wednesday, 11th January 2017 From Ayrton Senna to Jack Brabant, Formula One has seen some greats. Is this the comprehensive list? 1 / 17 Ayrton Senna, before the 1989 Hungarian Grand Prix. 
GETTY FASHIONISTAS: The new couple attended Paris Fashion Week together 
The pair first started romance rumours when they were both seen together at last month's Paris Fashion Week. 
The fashion forward couple attended the Balmain Menswear show, and rumours of that love was in the air were rife. 
But Sofia, who is singer Lionel Richie's daughter, may want to pump the brakes on this romance – Lewis is a known playboy. The hottest F1 WAG's We take a look at the The hottest F1 WAG's 1 / 9 Brittny Ward and Jenson Button 
INSTAGRAM HISTORY: Lewis has dated a string of famous beauties while Sofia dated Justin 
The F1 legend has been linked to many famous faces including Rita Ora and model Barbara Palvin. 
He also had a six year on/off relationship with smokin' hot X Factor judge Nicole Scherzinger as well as a fling with America's Next Top Model star, Winnie Harlow. 
However, even though young Sofia is still a teen she's already bagged herself a brief relationship with Justin Bieber. 
GETTY PAST LOVE: Justin and Sofia lasted just six short weeks Justin Bieber's dating history We take a look at the hottest girls that pop sensation Justin Bieber has dated. 1 / 26 
The two then enjoyed a trip to Mexico for Sofia's 18th birthday but the couple's lengthy romance soon fizzled out after just six weeks. 
Daily Star Online have contacted Lewis and Sofia's reps for comment. Related articles
